• Influencer: Tyler Scott
            • Brand: Pizza Hut
            • Fee: ~$10,259
            • Deliverables: 1 x 15-second TikTok, 1 x Twitter post, 3 x TV appearance, 2 x Facebook post, 1 x Facebook story
            • Exclusivity: 3 weeks
            • Engagement: 2 months
            • Usage: 8 months
            • Start: October 2025
